name: Tomato Alpine Penne Pasta
description: This Tomato Alpine Penne Pasta is a perfect choice for those looking for a healthified twist on a classic pasta dish. With its low sugar content, it suits a diet conscious of maintaining low sugar levels while not compromising on taste. The high-sodium tag suggests a flavorful experience, making it an ideal recipe for those who appreciate a well-seasoned meal. Enjoy a wholesome and Healthy Recipe that brings a creative twist to your table.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: Rinse the cooked Penne Rigate under warm water and set aside. Dice the tomato and grate the cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the diced tomato with 2 tsp of salt and 2 tsp of pepper, mix well to ensure even distribution.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet over medium heat, add the seasoned diced tomato and cook until they soften, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked Penne Rigate to the skillet with the tomatoes and stir to combine. Heat through, about 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the heat and add the grated cheese over the pasta. Stir well until the cheese melts and coats the pasta evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Tomato Alpine Penne Pasta hot, garnished with additional cheese if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
